#summary ChromeVox API

= [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox API] =

The [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox] API allows web applications to interact with [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox] in order to provide smoother, richer auditory user interfaces.

These APIs allow web developers to make [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox] speak custom messages, play earcons, and set [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox's] internal reading position.


= Details =

The following JavaScript methods are available:
----
  ===cvox.Api.speak(textString, queueMode, properties)===
    Speaks the given string using the specified queueMode and properties.

    * *textString*  The string of text to be spoken.

    * *queueMode*   Valid modes are 0 for flush; 1 for queue.

    * *properties*  Speech properties to use for this utterance.
----
  ===cvox.Api.stop()===
    Stops speech.
----
  ===cvox.Api.playEarcon(earcon)===
    Plays the specified earcon sound.

    * *earcon* An earcon name.
   Valid names are:

     ALERT_MODAL

     ALERT_NONMODAL

     BULLET

     BUSY_PROGRESS_LOOP

     BUSY_WORKING_LOOP

     BUTTON

     CHECK_OFF

     CHECK_ON

     COLLAPSED

     EDITABLE_TEXT

     ELLIPSIS

     EXPANDED

     FONT_CHANGE

     INVALID_KEYPRESS

     LINK

     LISTBOX

     LIST_ITEM

     NEW_MAIL

     OBJECT_CLOSE

     OBJECT_DELETE

     OBJECT_DESELECT

     OBJECT_OPEN

     OBJECT_SELECT

     PARAGRAPH_BREAK

     SEARCH_HIT

     SEARCH_MISS

     SECTION

     TASK_SUCCESS

     WRAP

     WRAP_EDGE
----
  ===cvox.Api.syncToNode(targetNode)===
    Synchronizes [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox's] internal cursor to the targetNode.

    Note that this will NOT trigger reading; it is only for setting the internal [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox] cursor so that when the user resumes reading, they will be starting from a reasonable position.

    * *targetNode*  The node that [http://code.google.com/p/google-axs-chrome ChromeVox] should be synced to.
----
